Trump admin has announced new steps to further restrict Americans travel to Cuba including banning group tours and cruise ship stops to the island nationThe changes are meant to tighten the economic pressure on the Cuban govt which Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross called one of our historically most aggressive adversaries The goal is to restrict nonfamily travel to Cuba in order to hold the Cuban regime accountable for its repression of the Cuban people and its support of the Maduro regime in Venezuela his agency said in a statementThese actions will help to keep US dollars out of the hands of Cuban military intelligence and security services said Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin in a statement calling Cuba destabilizing in the Western Hemisphere providing a communist foothold in the region and propping up US adversaries in places like Venezuela and NicaraguaRCL CCL NCLHShow More
